name: Osaurus PPTX
description: Create, modify, and export PowerPoint presentations. Supports text, images, shapes, tables, charts, themes, and more.

tools.name: create_presentation
tools.description: Create a new PowerPoint presentation. Returns a presentation_id to use with other tools.

tools.name: add_slide
tools.description: Add a new slide to a presentation. The layout parameter is metadata only â€” you must add elements (text, images, shapes, etc.) manually using add_text, add_image, and other tools.

tools.name: add_text
tools.description: Add a text box to a slide with rich formatting options.

tools.name: add_image
tools.description: Add an image to a slide from a file in the workspace. Supports PNG, JPG, GIF, SVG, BMP, TIFF.

tools.name: add_shape
tools.description: Add a geometric shape to a slide. 21 shape types available including rectangles, arrows, stars, and more.

tools.name: add_table
tools.description: Add a data table to a slide with header styling, alternating row colors, and optional cell merging.

tools.name: add_chart
tools.description: Add a chart to a slide. Supports bar, column, line, pie, and doughnut chart types.

tools.name: set_slide_background
tools.description: Set a slide's background to a solid color or gradient.

tools.name: delete_slide
tools.description: Remove a slide from a presentation by its number.

tools.name: read_presentation
tools.description: Read an existing PPTX file into memory for viewing or modification. Returns a presentation_id.

tools.name: get_presentation_info
tools.description: Get metadata and content summary for a presentation. Use include_details=true for full element details.

tools.name: save_presentation
tools.description: Save a presentation as a .pptx file to the workspace.
